com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_client

Class BuildRuleEventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_client.BuildRuleEventManager

  • public class BuildRuleEventManager
extends Object
    Handles build rule events sent by distributed build workers

      • recordBuildRuleUnlockedEvent

        public void recordBuildRuleUnlockedEvent(String buildTarget)
        Records the receipt of a BuildRuleUnlocked event. As we do not expect remote machines taking part in the build to be uploading artifacts for the rule, we signal completion immediately to unlock the rule and allow local client to progress with the build.
        Parameters:
        buildTarget -

      • allBuildRulesFinishedEventReceived

        public boolean allBuildRulesFinishedEventReceived()
        Returns:
        true if ALL_BUILD_RULES_FINISHED_EVENT received.

      • flushAllPendingBuildRuleFinishedEvents

        public void flushAllPendingBuildRuleFinishedEvents()
        Publishes results of all pending BuildRuleFinishedEvent, waiting for cache synchronization if necessary.

      • publishCacheSynchronizedBuildRuleFinishedEvents

        public void publishCacheSynchronizedBuildRuleFinishedEvents()
        Publishes results of pending BuildRuleFinishedEvent that have already synchronized with cache.
